BackCBInternalRotation.name: Cable Seated Shoulder Internal Rotation
BackCBInternalRotation.preparation: Sit with side to low pulley. Grasp cable stirrup with near arm. Position elbow against side with elbow bent approximately 90.
BackCBInternalRotation.execution: Pull cable stirrup toward body by internally rotating shoulder until forearm is across belly. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.
BackCBInternalRotation.comments: Maintain elbow against side and fixed elbow position throughout exercise. Exercise may be performed standing with medium high  adjustable pulley

BackCBStandingInternalRotation.name: Cable Standing Shoulder Internal Rotation
BackCBStandingInternalRotation.preparation: Stand with side to elbow height cable pulley. Grasp cable stirrup with near arm. Position elbow against side with elbow bent approximately 90.
BackCBStandingInternalRotation.execution: Pull cable stirrup toward body by internally rotating shoulder until forearm is across belly. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.
BackCBStandingInternalRotation.comments: Maintain elbow against side and fixed elbow position throughout exercise. Exercise may be performed seated if medium high  adjustable pulley is not availble.
